S.FORM: == balangbang == 秋天 puu' nu balangbang. siwkay nu balangbang balangbang sa, u sakatulu nu puu' nu mihca. zikuz nu lalud. caaytu kacaledes, lingatu tu ku sienaw. masumanah tu ku papah nu kilang. saepi' ku demiad. tinaku a kamu balangbang 秋季 mabadi' ku papah nu kilang i Lipun tu balangbangan. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika Autumn or fall is one of the four temperate seasons. Autumn marks the transition from summer to winter, in September or March , when the duration of daylight becomes noticeably shorter and the temperature cools down considerably. One of its main features is the shedding of leaves from deciduous trees.

== balangbang == 秋天 poo' no balangbang. siwkay no balangbang balangbang sa, o sakatolo no poo' no mihca. zikoz no lalod. caayto kacaledes, lingato to ko sienaw. masomanah to ko papah no kilang. saepi' ko demiad. tinako a kamo balangbang 秋季 mabadi' ko papah no kilang i Lipon to balangbangan. o solit no Holam ato Amilika Aotomn or fall is one of the foor temperate seasons. Aotomn marks the transition from sommer to winter, in September or March , when the doration of daylight becomes noticeably shorter and the temperatore cools down considerably. One of its main featores is the shedding of leaves from decidooos trees.
